Description:
This is not a race in a circle, it's not a dull demonstration of new technologies. This is not a race at all.
This - RALLY! Paris-Dakar Rally, the most famous automotive adventure in the world.
Before you - a detailed prototype of this route, 17 racing days, more than six and a half thousand miles in 12 countries.
Ability to use different ways to the entrance to the finish. Sure that your truck, SUV or swamp buggy can overcome?
For God's sake, dive, but you know - There is a workaround. On your way to meet all of the beauty of North Africa,
from the jungle to the coast, through savannah and bush, to the sand dunes and the monuments of Egypt.
A fantastic adventure full of real dangers. Four classes of vehicles. The magnificent three-dimensional graphics.
Detailed physical machines. A world that will conquer!
